      Config parameters for lucene
      static interface  LuceneUtil.PREPROCESSTYPES
      Preprocess types defined Depending on the preprocess type different preprocessing is needed
      static interface  LuceneUtil.STORE
      Constants to avoid referencing lucene store constants from the fieldType classes
      static interface  LuceneUtil.TOKENIZE
      Constants to avoid referencing lucene tokenize constants from the fieldType classes

      • getLuceneDateValue

        public static java.lang.String getLuceneDateValue(java.lang.Object value)
        Typically the value itself converted to string But there are some exceptions where the toString() doesn't work as expected. It should be implemented specific to the lucene requirement to be indexable set the date according to offset from the GMT see http://www.gossamer-threads.com/lists/lucene/java-user/39303?search_string=DateTools;#39303
        Parameters:
        value -
        Returns:
